name: Ocean Remotion
description:
Made for the SEAJAM!

Challenge: Learn SFML (C++)

Additional assets: nyom

How to play:

- Hover your mouse to control the hook

- When it is over the trash you get 1 point

- When it is over the fish you lose

- When it is over the sea grass the hook get stuck for a while

- Reach as much points as possible

Jam Submission
